description:
The battle between Takumi versus Don Calma, a member of the underground chefs, begins! The theme of the battle is to create amuse-bouche as a team. However, Isami, who is supposed to help Takumi, doesn’t show up at the venue. It turns out that he had been kidnapped by Don Calma’s cronies. Takumi’s back is to the wall, when Soma unexpectedly appears!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Missing Half of the Moon
